name: static
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
